mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score (uid, nid, score, content, time, like_num) VALUES (#{uid}, #{nid}, #{score}, #{content}, #{time}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT score.uid, score.nid, score.score FROM score WHERE nid = #{nid} AND uid = #{uid}
SELECT score.score FROM score WHERE nid = #{nid} and uid = #{uid}

SELECT score.score, score.time, score.content, score.like_num, novel.nid, novel.title, novel.cover, novel.recent_chapter_id, novel.update_time, novel.state, novel.introduction, user.uid, user.username, user.portrait, label.lid, label.label_name, chapter.cid, chapter.chapter_name FROM score LEFT JOIN novel ON score.nid = novel.nid LEFT JOIN user ON novel.uid = user.uid LEFT JOIN chapter ON novel.recent_chapter_id = chapter.cid LEFT JOIN label ON novel.lid = label.lid WHERE score.uid = #{uid}
SELECT score.score, score.content, score.time, score.like_num, user.uid, user.username, user.portrait FROM score LEFT JOIN user ON score.uid = user.uid WHERE score.nid = #{nid} ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM score WHERE nid = #{nid}
SELECT CONVERT(AVG(score), DECIMAL(2, 1)) AS avg FROM score WHERE nid = #{nid}
mapper.update: UPDATE score SET score = #{score}, content = #{content}, time = #{time} WHERE uid = #{uid} AND nid = #{nid}
